name: Jason Drake and the Winding Tower
name_original: Jason Drake and the Winding Tower
description:
You are Jason Drake, a fledgling treasure hunter following his big brother's footsteps.

You've come to the Winding Tower where riches beyond reckoning are promised to whoever is able to climb it!

The only way up is your trusty grappling hook.

Controls:

Mouse Movement: Rotate view
Mouse Left Click: Shoot grapple hook

Controller right joystick: Rotate view

Controller RT trigger: Shoot grapple hook
